commit.message:
re PR target/67391 ([SH] Convert clrt addc to normal add insn)

gcc/
	PR target/67391
	* config/sh/sh.md (addsi3, *addsi3_compact): Don't check for overlapping
	regs when matching the pattern.

From-SVN: r228046

files.patch:

+	regs when matching the pattern.
